arts.ttl: Isak a doubt for Liverpool’s Premier League game at Brentford after groin injury
arts.sum: Alexander Isak is a doubt for Liverpool’s Premier League game at Brentford on Saturday after picking up a groin injury against Eintracht Frankfurt this week. Mohamed Salah is also struggling for form and has not scored in his last six games for Liverpool, but Slot said he was confident the goals would come for the Egypt international.

arts.ttl: Isak injury doubt for Liverpool at Brentford
arts.sum: Alexander Isak is an injury concern for Liverpool's trip to Brentford this weekend.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot Gives Alexander Isak, Jeremie Frimpong Injury Verdicts Before Brentford
arts.sum: Liverpool hope to continue their resurgence away at Brentford on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Brentford vs Liverpool predictions: Champions set for overdue capital gains
arts.sum: Tom McGarry expects Liverpool to snap their three-game losing streak in the Premier League by winning an entertaining contest away to Brentford on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot confirms four-man Liverpool injury update before Brentford trip
arts.sum: Liverpool are bidding for a return to winning ways in the Premier League after three straight defeats

arts.sum: Former Liverpool captain Jordan Henderson will face his old club when Brentford host the Reds in the Premier League on Saturday and Andy Robertson is looking forward to seeing him
